oai_dc:dc.dc:title: A 12-membered to a strained 11-membered ring: first stereoselective total synthesis of (-)-asteriscunolide C
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: FERNANDES, RA
CHAVAN, VP
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: ENANTIOSELECTIVE TOTAL-SYNTHESIS
CLOSING METATHESIS
OLEFIN METATHESIS
ASTERISCUNOLIDE-D
ALDEHYDES
LACTONES
FRAGMENT
STRATEGY
CATALYST
ANALOGS
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The first stereoselective total synthesis of (-)-asteriscunolide C has been accomplished in 12 steps in a 16% overall yield. The key step is the conversion of a 12-membered to a strained 11-membered ring with one Z- and two E-double bonds employing a late stage ring-closing metathesis.
